actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to exclude coverage of gender-transition procedures for minors and abortion under health plans offered through the American Health Benefits Exchanges, and for other purposes.
short_title: Prohibiting Abortion & Transgender Procedures on the Exchanges Act

titles.title: Prohibiting Abortion & Transgender Procedures on the Exchanges Act
Prohibiting Abortion & Transgender Procedures on the Exchanges Act

A bill to amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to exclude coverage of gender-transition procedures for minors and abortion under health plans offered through the American Health Benefits Exchanges, and for other purposes.
